StringLoggerÂ¶

struct asmjit::StringLogger
#include <logger.h>

String logger.

Public Functions

ASMJIT_API StringLogger()

Create new StringLogger.

ASMJIT_API ~StringLogger()

Destroy the StringLogger.

const char * getString()

Get char* pointer which represents the resulting string.

The pointer is owned by StringLogger, it can’t be modified or freed.

void clearString()

Clear the resulting string.

ASMJIT_API void logString(uint32_t style, const char * buf, size_t len = kInvalidIndex)

Abstract method to log output.

Default implementation that is in asmjit::Logger is to do nothing. It’s virtual to fit to your logging system.

Public Members

StringBuilder _stringBuilder

Output.

Private Functions

StringLogger(const StringLogger & other)

StringLogger & operator=(const StringLogger & other)
